languages.text: "Лишь наиболее важные, в которых задействованы интересы благороднейших особ и видных фракций {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g}. Судебные тяжбы между знатными домами, что тянутся несколько поколений, конфликты между власть имущими слугами Его, затрагивающие торговлю и безопасность протектората, и другие первостепенные разбирательства!"

traits.locale_text: "Лишь наиболее важные, в которых задействованы интересы благороднейших особ и видных фракций {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g}. Судебные тяжбы между знатными домами, что тянутся несколько поколений, конфликты между власть имущими слугами Его, затрагивающие торговлю и безопасность протектората, и другие первостепенные разбирательства!"

languages.text: "Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputes between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the protectorate; and other litigations of supreme significance!"
languages.original_text: "Лишь наиболее важные, в которых задействованы интересы благороднейших особ и видных фракций {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g}. Судебные тяжбы между знатными домами, что тянутся несколько поколений, конфликты между власть имущими слугами Его, затрагивающие торговлю и безопасность протектората, и другие первостепенные разбирательства!"

traits.locale_text: "Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the Imperium. Lawsuits between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the Protectorate; and other litigations of supreme importance!"

Lawsuits between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the Protectorate; and other litigations of supreme importance!"

"Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputes between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the protectorate; and other litigations of supreme significance!"

languages.text: "Nur die wichtigsten Fälle, die die Interessen hochgeborener Persönlichkeiten und prominenter Gruppierungen des {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperiums{/g} betreffen. Seit Generationen schwelende Streitigkeiten zwischen Adelshäusern. Konflikte zwischen Dienern des Gottimperators, die mit Autoritäten versehen sind, deren Missachtung den Handel und die Sicherheit des Protektorats beeinträchtigt. Und andere Streitfragen von übergeordnetem Interesse."
languages.original_text: "Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputes between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the protectorate; and other litigations of supreme significance!"

traits.locale_text: "Nur die wichtigsten Fälle, die die Interessen hochgeborener Persönlichkeiten und prominenter Gruppierungen des Imperiums betreffen. Seit Generationen schwelende Streitigkeiten zwischen Adelshäusern. Konflikte zwischen Dienern des Gottimperators, die mit Autoritäten versehen sind, deren Missachtung den Handel und die Sicherheit des Protektorats beeinträchtigt. Und andere Streitfragen von übergeordnetem Interesse."

"Nur die wichtigsten Fälle, die die Interessen hochgeborener Persönlichkeiten und prominenter Gruppierungen des Imperiums betreffen. Seit Generationen schwelende Streitigkeiten zwischen Adelshäusern. Konflikte zwischen Dienern des Gottimperators, die mit Autoritäten versehen sind, deren Missachtung den Handel und die Sicherheit des Protektorats beeinträchtigt. Und andere Streitfragen von übergeordnetem Interesse."

languages.text: « Seuls les plus importants qui concernent les intérêts de la haute aristocratie et des factions principales de l'{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} : des différends entre maisons nobles qui s'étendent sur plusieurs générations, des conflits entre les figures d'autorité au service de l'Empereur-Dieu dont les désaccords nuisent au commerce et à la sécurité du protectorat, ainsi que d'autres litiges d'envergure suprême ! »
languages.original_text: "Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputes between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the protectorate; and other litigations of supreme significance!"

traits.locale_text: « Seuls les plus importants qui concernent les intérêts de la haute aristocratie et des factions principales de l'Imperium : des différends entre maisons nobles qui s'étendent sur plusieurs générations, des conflits entre les figures d'autorité au service de l'Empereur-Dieu dont les désaccords nuisent au commerce et à la sécurité du protectorat, ainsi que d'autres litiges d'envergure suprême ! »

« Seuls les plus importants qui concernent les intérêts de la haute aristocratie et des factions principales de l'Imperium : des différends entre maisons nobles qui s'étendent sur plusieurs générations, des conflits entre les figures d'autorité au service de l'Empereur-Dieu dont les désaccords nuisent au commerce et à la sécurité du protectorat, ainsi que d'autres litiges d'envergure suprême ! »

languages.text: “这里仅审理那些最重要的案件，涉及到整个{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}身份最为高贵的成员，以及声望最为显赫的家族。比如说，持续了许多代的贵族家族纠纷，或是神皇最重要的仆从之间的冲突，这些分歧与冲突可能会影响王朝的贸易与安全。除此之外，还包括其他极其重要的诉讼！”
languages.original_text: "Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputes between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the protectorate; and other litigations of supreme significance!"

traits.locale_text: “这里仅审理那些最重要的案件，涉及到整个帝国身份最为高贵的成员，以及声望最为显赫的家族。比如说，持续了许多代的贵族家族纠纷，或是神皇最重要的仆从之间的冲突，这些分歧与冲突可能会影响王朝的贸易与安全。除此之外，还包括其他极其重要的诉讼！”
“这里仅审理那些最重要的案件，涉及到整个帝国身份最为高贵的成员，以及声望最为显赫的家族。比如说，持续了许多代的贵族家族纠纷，或是神皇最重要的仆从之间的冲突，这些分歧与冲突可能会影响王朝的贸易与安全。除此之外，还包括其他极其重要的诉讼！”

languages.text: «Solo se tratan los casos más importantes, que afectan a los intereses de la más alta nobleza y de las facciones destacadas del {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputas entre casas nobles que duran múltiples generaciones; conflictos entre los sirvientes del Dios Emperador dotados de autoridad, cuyos desacuerdos afectan al comercio y la seguridad del protectorado; y otros litigios de importancia comparable».
languages.original_text: "Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputes between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the protectorate; and other litigations of supreme significance!"

traits.locale_text: «Solo se tratan los casos más importantes, que afectan a los intereses de la más alta nobleza y de las facciones destacadas del Imperium: disputas entre casas nobles que duran múltiples generaciones; conflictos entre los sirvientes del Dios Emperador dotados de autoridad, cuyos desacuerdos afectan al comercio y la seguridad del protectorado; y otros litigios de importancia comparable».

«Solo se tratan los casos más importantes, que afectan a los intereses de la más alta nobleza y de las facciones destacadas del Imperium: disputas entre casas nobles que duran múltiples generaciones; conflictos entre los sirvientes del Dios Emperador dotados de autoridad, cuyos desacuerdos afectan al comercio y la seguridad del protectorado; y otros litigios de importancia comparable».

languages.text: 「ここで扱われるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}の高貴なる者たちや著名な派閥の利害に関わる、最も重要な案件のみです。たとえば、代々続く貴族家同士の争い、神帝陛下の奉仕者である権威ある方々の間で起こる対立や、それが保護領の交易や治安に影響を及ぼすような場合。そして、他にも極めて重大な訴訟案件を扱っております！」
languages.original_text: "Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputes between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the protectorate; and other litigations of supreme significance!"

traits.locale_text: 「ここで扱われるのは、帝国の高貴なる者たちや著名な派閥の利害に関わる、最も重要な案件のみです。たとえば、代々続く貴族家同士の争い、神帝陛下の奉仕者である権威ある方々の間で起こる対立や、それが保護領の交易や治安に影響を及ぼすような場合。そして、他にも極めて重大な訴訟案件を扱っております！」
「ここで扱われるのは、帝国の高貴なる者たちや著名な派閥の利害に関わる、最も重要な案件のみです。たとえば、代々続く貴族家同士の争い、神帝陛下の奉仕者である権威ある方々の間で起こる対立や、それが保護領の交易や治安に影響を及ぼすような場合。そして、他にも極めて重大な訴訟案件を扱っております！」

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}İmparatorluğun{/g} en asil haneleriyle nüfuzlu fraksiyonların menfaatlerini ilgilendiren en mühim davalar: Nesiller boyu süren soylu çekişmeleri, Tanrı İmparator'un yetki sahibi hizmetkârları arasındaki ve protektoranın ticareti ile asayişini etkileyen ihtilafları… Kısacası, azami ehemmiyet taşıyan tüm muhakemeler!"
languages.original_text: "Only the most important ones that involve the interests of the highest-born persons and prominent factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}: disputes between noble houses that go on for generations; conflicts between the God-Emperor's servants who are vested with authority and whose disagreements affect trade and security in the protectorate; and other litigations of supreme significance!"

"{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}İmparatorluğun{/g} en asil haneleriyle nüfuzlu fraksiyonların menfaatlerini ilgilendiren en mühim davalar: Nesiller boyu süren soylu çekişmeleri, Tanrı İmparator'un yetki sahibi hizmetkârları arasındaki ve protektoranın ticareti ile asayişini etkileyen ihtilafları… Kısacası, azami ehemmiyet taşıyan tüm muhakemeler!"
